Package com.ibm.watson.dsm.services.stash

Provides simplified distributed named data sharing services.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSharedStash<DESC extends ISharedDataDescriptor,DATA extends ISharedData<DESC>,STORAGE extends IDataStorage<DESC,DATA>,QUERY extends IDataQuery<DESC,DATA>>
    A thin layer over an ISharedDataPlatform to provide the ability to get named data from across the network of reach nodes also running this application.
    SharedBeanStash
    Application that can be used for sharing Serializable objects across the network using a simple put/get mechanism.
    SharedTupleStash
    Application that can be used for sharing ITupleSets across the network using a simple put/get mechanism.

Package com.ibm.watson.dsm.services.stash Description

Provides simplified distributed named data sharing services.
